message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for a special introductory price of $110.  I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $95 for it.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While $95 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $105 just for you. This is a one-time offer, so let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still looking for a better deal, but I think $98 would be a fair price for the product.
Bob, this is a really great product and $98 just doesn't reflect its value.  I can do $100, but that's my absolute final offer. It's a steal at this price!
I understand your position, Alice. I'd like to stay within my budget. I propose $97 for the product.
